## OmvRestClient class

REST client supporting getting protobuf OMV Tile from REST-based servers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class OmvRestClient implements DataProvider 
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [connect()](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclient.connect.md) |  | Overriding abstract method, in this case doing nothing. |
|  [getTile(tileKey, abortSignal)](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclient.gettile.md) |  | Asynchronously fetches a tile from this restful server.<!-- -->\*\*Note:\*\* If the tile doesn't exist, a successful response with a <code>404</code> status code is returned. |
|  [ready()](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclient.ready.md) |  | Overriding abstract method, in this case always returning <code>true</code>. |
